problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,分别交AB,AC于点D,E．若AD=2,DB=4,则\frac{AE}{AC}的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, intersect AB and AC at points D and E respectively. If AD = N_0, DB = N_1, then the value of \frac AEAC is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行线分线段成比例定理；由平行线分线段成比例定理得出比例式是解决问题的关键．
